::SnowCat::

She walked around the ship.  She saw the damage that teh shi[ had 
taken.  She stopped in one hallway and leaned up against a wall and 
closed her eyes.  She sniffed the air and sighed.  She knew her 
insticts told her to come here and help, she just wondered if she had 
come to late.  She had a smile slowly appear on her face.  She 
thought that as long as there was one bot to fight with, she wasn't 
late at all.  She smiled and walked along the hallway.  She went to 
the entrance and sat on the ramp and looked up at the sky.  She saw 
the same sky she had seen up in the mountains. She whispered,"Yup, 
same sky, same sun, same air.  Just, different ground."  She 
sighed,"I miss the snow though."  She sat on the ramp, with her knees 
up to her chin, and looked around the grounds around the ship.
